entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-02-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .Net9 - Inconsistent result for GZipStream compression between Windows and Linux (Ubuntu/WSL) #112770
  • Json.DeepEquals incorrectly returns true for when comparing objects with only null values #112769
  • Why my ETW provider is now showing up in logman? #112768
  • JIT fails to treat expression as non-negative after range check #112765
    10.0.0
  • Track APX push2/pop2 OS changes for .NET unwinder changes #112762
  • ConcurrentBag Memory Leak #112759
  • [APX] Get ThreadContext for APX extended registers #112757
    10.0.0
  • Zero-sized diffs in smoke_tests.nativeaot #112756
  • System.Numerics.Tensors.Tests.ConvertTests.ConvertChecked test failure #112755
  • Timeout in SocketsHttpHandler_HttpClientHandlerTest.GetAsync_ManyDifferentResponseHeaders_ParsedCorrectly #112752
  • CoreCLR Interpreter #112748
    10.0.0
  • .NET 9 Applications can randomly freeze when being debugged #112747
    10.0.0
  • CoreCLR Interpreter - diagnostics #112744
    10.0.0
  • CoreCLR Interpreter - preventing executable code generation at runtime #112743
    10.0.0
  • CoreCLR Interpreter - CoreCLR support #112742
    10.0.0
  • Can not build dotnet runtime due to 404 error while installing dotnet sdk v10.0.100-alpha.1.25077.2 #112739
  • System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.Tests.CollectionTests "Assert.Equal() Failure: Values differ" #112738
  • [System.Text.Json] Stack Overflow when appending modifiers to TypeInfoResolverChain #112735
    10.0.0
  • [mono] bug about wasm single thread using lock #112734
    10.0.0
  • NU1511 warnings/errors for test projects with .NET 10 SDK #112729
  • Dotnet on OSX is limited to 10240 file handles #112726
  • JIT: Redundant bounds check, computed lower bound is `Dependent` instead of 0 #112725
    Future

Closed

  • Dotnet build hangs at CoreCompile when specific NuGet package referenced #112502
    10.0.0
  • ARM64 architecture in Debian 9 repository #3298
    Future
  • AV in System.Threading.Tests failing with JitStress #112683
    10.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: TimeOfDay set and AtTimeOfDay function #112731
  • Problem: nothing provides libopenssl1_1 needed by dotnet-runtime-deps-2.2-2.2.7-1.x86_64 #3768
    Future
  • HostingAbstractionsHostExtensions RunAsync disposes without logging #72225
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Add ObjectDisposedException static throw based on boolean #112746
  • [API Proposal]: M.E.C.M. MemoryCache - add ReadOnlySpan<char> get API #110504
    10.0.0
  • Path.GetFileNameWithoutExtension returns full path and filename #112707
  • Test failure: JIT/Regression/JitBlue/Runtime_82535/Runtime_82535/Runtime_82535.dll #112333
    10.0.0
  • [browser] itanium_demangle symbols in .wasm file #110861
    10.0.0
  • JIT: Unchecked write barriers are emitted for stack allocated arrays #112709
    10.0.0
  • Calling GCHandle.Free causes other handles to be released #112727
  • Inject HttpClient get Error: Method not found: SocketsHttpHandler.get_MeterFactory() #112634
  • [API Proposal]: X509Certificate.ExportPkcs12 with PBE parameters #80314
    Future
  • Performance regression: PerfLabTests.StackWalk.Walk #13136
  • Pinned object problems #37205

PullRequests

Created

  • Use rangecheck in assertprop #112766
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • SPMI: Record and replay `notifyInstructionSetUsage` properly #112764
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Document important nuances about Dictionary/HashSet #112760
    area-System.Collections
  • Clarify comments for `ClrRestoreNonvolatileContextWorker`. #112758
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/10.0-preview2] Bump downlevel for 10.0p2 #112754
    Servicing-approved, area-Workloads
  • Fix HttpHandlerDiagnosticListenerTests.TestW3CHeadersTraceStateAndCorrelationContext #112753
    area-System.Diagnostics, 10.0.0
  • Add benchmarks.run_pgo_optrepeat collection #112750
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Change the Unix cert store to store certificates with AES256+SHA256 PBES2 #112749
    area-System.Security
  • Use pooled Utf8JsonWriter when doing sync streaming serialization. #112745
    area-System.Text.Json
  • JIT: Support bitwise field extractions from parameter registers #112740
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix stack overflow condition when appending modifiers to resolver chains. #112737
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Make linux-riscv nativeaot port robust #112736
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, arch-riscv
  • JIT: Keep small-typedness information for return temps introduced by GDV #112733
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Unblock Vector###<long> intrinsics on x86 #112728
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Coretestlib: Add information of parent process id during test failure for Windows #112724
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [Testing only] Remove PAL dependencies in sharedmemory files #112721
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • Reduce memory footprint of HTTP/2 connections #112719
    area-System.Net.Http, 10.0.0

Merged

  • Fix exception handling in the prestub worker - take 2 #112666
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr
  • Relax encrypted cert requirement for Windows with Pkcs12Export tests #112741
    area-System.Security
  • M.E.C.M. Add TryGetValue(ReadOnlySpan<char>) API #112695
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Caching
  • Bump the minimum ICU version to 60 #112713
    area-System.Globalization
  • [release/9.0-staging] Remove unneeded DiagnosticSource content #112708
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, 9.0.4
  • Clean up our runtime-deps packages and enable ARM64 Debs #112671
    area-Setup
  • Fix winarm64 crossdac build #112594
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Update HelloAndroid App output path and PerfBDN dotnet-install.sh url. #112720
    area-Infrastructure
  • Host: log exception if a service factory fails #112534
    area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • Flow DotNetBuildTests #112732
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [WinHTTP] Remove unnecessary recursion #112698
    area-System.Net
  • Specialize Contains for Iterators in LINQ #112684
    area-System.Linq
  • Handle overlapped groups of bounds checks #112660
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Reapply "[browser][MT] move wasm MT CI legs to extra-platforms (#112712)" #112716
    area-Build-mono
  • Fix flags in EarlyProp after nullcheck is removed #112717
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] remove EXPORT_EXCEPTION_HANDLING_HELPERS #111033
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser
  • [browser] single threaded diagnostic server #111910
    arch-wasm, area-Diagnostics-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • JIT: Delete old `GenTreeCall` ABI information #112665
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Don't emit unchecked write barrier for stack-allocated arrays #112711
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Clean up and optimize `StackLevelSetter` #112561
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Replace `fgMoveHotJumps` with 3-opt utility #112016
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Bump main to preview3 #112718
    area-Infrastructure
  • Implement ExportPkcs12 #112569
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, cryptographic-docs-impact, 10.0.0

Updated

  • Remove ILLink support for field init substitutions #107380
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Generate calls to interface methods through resolve helper #112406
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Optimize Min/Max paths with AVX10.2 intrinsics #112535
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [browser] samplepoint instrumentation into Mono profiler #112352
    arch-wasm, area-Diagnostics-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Add the `CurrentUserOnly` and `CurrentSessionOnly` options for named `Mutex`, `Semaphore`, and `EventWaitHandle` #112213
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, 10.0.0
  • Remove thread pointer from AwareLock #112715
    area-VM-coreclr
  • CoreCLR interpreter basic compilation and execution #112369
    area-CodeGen-Interpreter-coreclr
  • Support generic type parameter when created with TypeBuilder #112372
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 10.0.0
  • [browser][st] event pipe #110818
    arch-wasm, area-Diagnostics-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix LINQ handling of iterator.Take(...).Last(...) #112714
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Linq, 9.0.x
  • [WinHTTP] Certificate caching on WinHttpHandler to eliminate extra call to Custom Certificate Validation #111791
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [release/8.0-staging] [mono][interp] Fix execution of delegate invoke wrapper with interpreter #112008
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, 8.0.14
  • [release/9.0-staging] Include PDB for all TfmRuntimeSpecificPackageFile #112139
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 9.0.3
  • Revamp the generation of runtime division checks on ARM64 #111543
    arch-arm64, area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/9.0-staging] [mono][interp] Fix execution of delegate invoke wrapper with interpreter #111700
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, 9.0.3
  • [release/9.0-staging] [mono][mini] Disable inlining if we encounter class initialization failure #112005
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 9.0.3
  • [release/8.0-staging] Change assembler to clang in android MonoAOT #111666
    Servicing-approved, area-Build-mono, 8.0.15
  • [Android] Minimal (and quick) set of changes to make CoreCLR host on Android work #112705
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Simplify stack probing on riscv64 #112697
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [TESTING ONLY] Add another set of debugging prints for stack overflow issue #112284
    NO-MERGE, area-PAL-coreclr
  • Blittable color #106575
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Arm-64:[PAC][WIP]Add auth-strip in prolog and epilog of jitted methods #110472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • testing CI - GC trace #112696
    area-Build-mono
  • JIT: Devirtualization and inlining for GVM #112353
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono] Clean-up reflection stack and unify type name parsers. #112670
    area-AssemblyLoader-mono, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Use zero register as argument for atomics #112693
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • JIT: Consolidate layout passes into one phase #112004
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: enhance escape analysis to understand `Span<T>` capture #112543
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
